channel.title: .::Looking for coders::
channel.description: Hey guys i'm new to making rsps. i haven't gotten one made. but i'm looking for help i somewhat know how to make one. and i wanna give it a try cause i would be good at it considering that i can be online for countless hours.i have a job IRL and i'm willing to but money into this. I just need help getting one up! I'd be willing to promote whoever helps me to co-owner. ~Thanks

item.title: .::Looking for coders::
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Take a look at our tutorial section for guides on how to run a server, we do not allow requests at the moment as they are against our rules. Also, if you’re interested in starting a development team, then check out this and then make a thread in that board.

Read full topic

item.title: .::Looking for coders::
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Lol why don’t someone just tell him the quick basics he needs to know;

-Download java
-download source and client
-adjust your source and client for your java
-Either portforward your port or use uTorrent to open your port (I made a program to open ports but don’t want to release due to many trolls saying it has a virus, if you like you can have the code in visual Basics, but uTorrent would be easier and quicker for you)
-look at tutorials compare and contrast
-READ the errors don’t just post it to server help because many errors are basic and tell you how to fix it!
-advertise your server and play it amongst your friends

Read full topic

item.title: .::Looking for coders::
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

This section isn’t to request help such as what you’re looking for, we have a tutorial section that provides all the essential links and tips to setting up a server. If you wish to getting into a server then you could join a development team and you never know, you may learn something new. One bit of a suggestion, don’t say you will be willing to pay for everything, you will most likely end up getting scammed of your money. The setting up of a server is quite easy these days you should have little problems considering the tutorial is easy to understand and with a little thinking anyone can do such a task.

Read full topic
